blocks.name: df-pjh
blocks.content: Define the projection function on a Hilbert space, as a mapping from the Hilbert lattice to a function on Hilbert space. Every closed subspace is associated with a unique projection function. Remark in [Kalmbach] p. 66, adopted as a definition. ` ( projh `` H ) `` A ` is the projection of vector ` A ` onto closed subspace ` H ` . Note that the range of ` projh ` is the set of all projection operators, so ` T e. ran projh ` means that ` T ` is a projection operator. (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pjh(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cpjh, cmpt(s0, cch, cmpt(s1, chba, crio(s2, cv(s0), wrex(s3, cfv(cort, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cva, cv(s3))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-pjh(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ projh =(s0 ∈ CH ↦(s1 ∈ ~H ↦ iota(s2 ∈ s0, ∃(s3 ∈(_|_ ` s0), s1 =(s2[+h]s3)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: pjhfval
blocks.content: The value of the projection map. (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjhfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(cfv(cpjh, c0), cmpt(s0, chba, crio(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cch, cpjh, cmpt(s0, chba, crio(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2)))))), cmpt(s0, chba, crio(s1, cv(hs0), wrex(s2, cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2)))))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, chba, crio(s1, cv(hs0), wrex(s2, cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2))))), crio(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  riotaeqbidv(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s2, cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2)))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rexeqdv(s2, cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cort)
  df-pjh(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mptex(s0, chba, crio(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2))))))
  ax-hilex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, chba, crio(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s2)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cort, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cort, c0)
  diff.cort.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.chba.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pjhfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CH →(projh ` c0)=(s0 ∈ ~H ↦ iota(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), s0 =(s1[+h]s2)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cch, cpjh, (s0 ∈ ~H ↦ iota(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), s0 =(s1[+h]s2)))), (s0 ∈ ~H ↦ iota(s1 ∈ hs0, ∃(s2 ∈(_|_ ` hs0), s0 =(s1[+h]s2)))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, chba, iota(s1 ∈ hs0, ∃(s2 ∈(_|_ ` hs0), s0 =(s1[+h]s2))), iota(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), s0 =(s1[+h]s2))), hs0 = c0)
  riotaeqbidv(s1, hs0, c0, hs0 = c0, ∃(s2 ∈(_|_ ` hs0), s0 =(s1[+h]s2)), ∃(s2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), s0 =(s1[+h]s2)))
  id(hs0 = c0)
  rexeqdv(s2, (_|_ ` hs0), (_|_ ` c0), hs0 = c0, s0 =(s1[+h]s2))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cort)
  df-pjh(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mptex(s0, chba, iota(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), s0 =(s1[+h]s2))))
  ax-hilex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ ~H ↦ iota(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), s0 =(s1[+h]s2)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cort, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cort, c0)
  diff.cort.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.chba.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pjhval
blocks.content: Value of a projection. (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjhval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), crio(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylan9eq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), crio(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, chba, crio(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))), c1), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba))
  fveq1d(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1, cmpt(hs0, chba, crio(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, cch))
  pjhfval(hs0, s0, s1, c0)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, chba, cmpt(hs0, chba, crio(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))), crio(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))), crio(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))
  riotabidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))
  rexbidv(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, chba, crio(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))))
  riotaex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(crio(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pjhval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H)→((projh ` c0)` c1)= iota(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), c1 =(s0[+h]s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylan9eq(((projh ` c0)` c1), iota(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), c1 =(s0[+h]s1))), ((hs0 ∈ ~H ↦ iota(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(s0[+h]s1))))` c1), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H)
  fveq1d((projh ` c0), c1, (hs0 ∈ ~H ↦ iota(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(s0[+h]s1)))), c0 ∈ CH)
  pjhfval(hs0, s0, s1, c0)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, chba, (hs0 ∈ ~H ↦ iota(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(s0[+h]s1)))), iota(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), c1 =(s0[+h]s1))), iota(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(s0[+h]s1))))
  riotabidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c1, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(s0[+h]s1)), ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), c1 =(s0[+h]s1)))
  rexbidv(s1, (_|_ ` c0), hs0 = c1, hs0 =(s0[+h]s1), c1 =(s0[+h]s1))
  eqeq1(hs0, c1, (s0[+h]s1))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ ~H ↦ iota(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(s0[+h]s1)))))
  riotaex(s0, c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), c1 =(s0[+h]s1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(iota(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), c1 =(s0[+h]s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: pjpreeq
blocks.content: Equality with a projection. This version of ~ pjeq does not assume the Axiom of Choice via ~ pjhth . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjpreeq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)))), wb(wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), c2), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(c2, cva, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), c2), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(c2, cva, cv(s0))))), wceq(crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), c2), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wceq(crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), c2)))
  pm4.71rd(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)))), wceq(crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), c2), wcel(c2, c0))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)))), wceq(crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), c2), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)))), wcel(crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), c0), wreu(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))))
  riotacl(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))
  eleq1(crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), c2, c0)
  eqeq1d(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), c2, crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, chba))
  sselda(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)), chba, wcel(c0, cch))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cch), wss(co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)), chba), wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), csh))
  shsss(c0, cfv(cort, c0))
  pjhval(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  pm5.32da(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)))), wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(c2, cva, cv(s0)))), wceq(crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), c2))
  syl2anr(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)))), wcel(c2, c0), wb(wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(c2, cva, cv(s0)))), wceq(crio(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), c2)), wcel(c2, c0), wreu(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))))
  id(wcel(c2, c0))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0)))), wreu(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), wmo(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0))), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cch), wb(wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0))), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), csh))
  shsel(hs0, s0, c0, cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, co(c0, cph, cfv(cort, c0))), wmo(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cch), wmo(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), csh), wceq(cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), c0h))
  syl(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), csh), wcel(c0, csh))
  shocsh(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), c0h), wcel(c0, csh))
  chsh(c0)
  ocin(c0)
  pjhthmo(hs0, s0, c0, cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  bitri(wreu(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), wa(wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), wmo(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))))), wa(wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), wrmo(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))))
  reu5(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))
  anbi2i(wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), wrmo(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))))), wmo(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))))
  df-rmo(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))))
  riota2(hs0, c2, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(c2, cva, cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0))), wceq(c1, co(c2, cva, cv(s0))))
  eqeq2d(c1, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(s0)), co(c2, cva, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c2, cva, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cort, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, c0)
  diff.cort.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(c2, cva, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pjeq
blocks.content: Equality with a projection. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jan-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: axpjcl
blocks.content: Closure of a projection in its subspace. If we consider this together with ~ axpjpj to be axioms, the need for the ~ ax-hcompl can often be avoided for the kinds of theorems we are interested in here. An interesting project is to see how far we can go by using them in place of it. In particular, we can prove the orthomodular law ~ pjomli .) (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: pjhcl
blocks.content: Closure of a projection in Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
